mapper.select: SELECT c.rid as rid, c.org_code as orgcode, DATE_FORMAT(a.result_date, '%Y-%m-%d %T') as bgrq, b.adjustsampletester_code as adjustcode, b.adjustsampletester_name as adjustname, c.machine_no as machineno, c.item_name as machinename, d.type as type, c.result as result, f.dict_name as unit, c.range_value as normalrange, c.upvalue as normalup, c.downvalue as normaldown, a.iscritical as iscritical, c.item_code as printcode, a.patient_type as patienttype, a.inhosno as inhosno, b.in_id as regid, b.exe_csqn as applyid, e.range_value as crisisscope, e.up_value as crisisup, e.down_value as crisisdown, c.flag as flag FROM lis_test_reg a LEFT JOIN lis_test_reg_his_item_detail b ON a.org_code = b.org_code AND a.reg_id = b.reg_id AND b.exe_csqn IS NOT NULL AND b.exe_csqn <> '' LEFT JOIN lis_result c ON a.org_code = c.org_code AND a.reg_id = c.reg_id AND a.machine_code = c.machine_code AND a.test_form_no = c.test_form_no LEFT JOIN lis_item d ON c.org_code = d.org_code AND c.machine_no = d.machine_item_code AND c.machine_code = d.machine_code left join lis_result_warning e on e.org_code = a.org_code and e.reg_id = a.reg_id AND a.machine_code = e.machine_code AND a.test_form_no = e.test_form_no left join lis_dictionary_detail f on f.type_code = 'LIS_ITEM_UNIT' and f.dict_code = c.unit WHERE a.is_adjustSample = '1' AND a.org_code = #{orgcode} AND a.result_date >= str_to_date(#{begtime}, '%Y-%m-%d %T') AND a.result_date <= str_to_date(#{endtime}, '%Y-%m-%d %T')
